article.aside: Stipulate that all content is used when data-sblg-content="1" is used in an Atom template. Allowed <hN>, <aside>, <time>, and <author> tags to appear anywhere in the article instead of just in the <header>. Disable expansion of internal entity references (e.g., <) so that input is completely preserved. Added titletext to filled-in parameters such as to differentiate from title, which includes any markup within the parse context. While there, add author and authortext.
